question:
Consider the following statements with regard to Security Council:
(a) India became member of Security Council seven times
(b) Japan became a member of Security Council eleven times
(c) It appoints non-permanent members
(d) It appoints Secretary General
Select the correct answer from the code given below:
explanation: India and Japan became members of Security Council seven and eleven times respectively. Under the Charter, the Security Council has primary responsibility for the maintenance of international peace and security and is one of the five principle organ of the United Nations.
